items.item_details:
Background and Analysis:
	 
Attached for your review are the Construction Project Photo Highlights.
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Mike Chegini
Additional contact names:
 Steven Kitchen, Executive Director, Facilities & Operations, x6150
Is backup provided?
 Yes

Background and Analysis:
	 
Attached please find the following reports for the period from inception through June 30, 2014:
	 
1)  CBOC Quarterly Summary Report (7 pages)
	 
2)  Capital Projects Update - Measure C Whole Program with the Project Update by Category (7 pages)
	 
	 
These reports give an overview of spending on a per project and program basis. The reports reflect funding sources (including earned interest), actual expenses to date and accruals posted for fiscal year end close.
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Steven Kitchen, Executive Director, Facilities & Operations, x6150
Additional contact names:
 Irina Thornton
Is backup provided?
 Yes

Background and Analysis:
	 
There were three Measure C Bond List Revisions during the reporting period ending June 30, 2014.  Two of these revisions were reported upon at the last meeting of the committee and all three are reflected in the Financial Reports.
	 
There was one Measure C Bond List Revision that occurred after the reporting period ending June 30, 2014, and prior to this meeting.  This revision took place at the following Board of Trustees' Meeting and is reflected in the attached Summary Report:
August 4, 2014
The Bond List Revision Summary Report and the associated back-up from the Board of Trustee meetings approving each revision is attached.
	 
	 
	 
Submitted by:
 Steven Kitchen, Executive Director of Facilities & Operations, x6150
Additional contact names:
 Irina Thornton
Is backup provided?
 Yes
